name: Robin: Wojownik Czasu
overview: Robin Wojownik Czasu is a side-scrolling platform game. The graphics are white & black except the points/energy panel, Robin and his pistol shots. The game features four long levels. In each level the player must find two items and reach the teleport device, avoiding a variety of animals (spiders, birds, falcons, lizards and others), moving stones and deadly spikes that take away the life energy. The hero has an infinite amount of ammo and the ability to jump. Each of the four levels is similar, only the arrangement of the components and the wanted items vary.
